content: s in the last corner st connection of the parts you have now reached the second diagonal edge unfold the upper part of the bow and using the of your work and the steps should become straight same thread you kept before wrap it around the to do this make 1 half_double_crochet then insert your hook into folded part 2 to 5 times put the tie behind insert the edge st followed by the first stitch of the next the thread into the tie to hold it then wrap the step and yarn over pull through all loops on the thread around the bow to shape it hook repeat the same for the next two steps then slip_stitch repeat this process at least 30 times then wrap into the next st which is the first stitch of row 7 the 10cm tie thread in the other direction tie both threads securely then cut the yarn fold your work in half and cut at least a 50 cm thread use a tapestry needle to sew the two parts together at the 20th stitch counting from the folded edge do not cut the thread as you will use it for the connection part to finish pull down the 2 ends to make them visibles or sew two st s together just under the wrap to fix them your scrunchie is now ready to wear welcome spring scrunchie by yarnseed 3 thank you for choosing the welcome spring scrunchie pattern i hope you enjoyed making it check out the yarnseed store for more free patterns or follow us on instagram @yarnseed to stay updated on my new patterns to complete your look check out the matching welcome spring vest pattern for a stylish and cohesive outfit
